Articles.Content:
It takes longer to drive to the beach than I\'d like but still, here\'s my attempt at the waterspeed record attempt:

Record title: World Water Speed Record

Record Statistic: 38.9 m/s

Game version when record achieved: 0.15.2

Screenshots: In attachments

Mods used: None

I have some landing gears on the bottom which I decouple when I get in the water.

Some tweaks to my craft to prevent it turning uncontrollably and I have some vast improvements

edit: Added Boosters!

Record title: World Water Speed Record

Record Statistic: 200 m/s

Game version when record achieved: 0.15.2

Screenshots: In attachments

Mods used: None
I beat your land speed record, I reached almost 400m/s ---> Proof:

Record title: Land speed record

Record Statistic: World Land speed record

Game version when record achieved: 0.2.1.1

Screenshots:

(A Video is better :3)

Mods used: None in the build or used as an aid.

mincespy, don't you know!

a picture of a weeping angel IS a weeping angel!

ZodiaK. DONT. BLINK.
This is kinda old. Seeing how much has changed since the OP, shouldn't we think about restarting this with a fresh thread?
Indeed, this is a necro, although not a bad idea, somebody should probably redo it.
I had about 2000 m/s airspeed with my plane, it was very easy to fly and stable. I havent got any images, but, it was so fast, it was making re-entry effects and had only 4 engines.

I reached 2,112m/s speed at 16km's.

It took me 17mins 23secs to fly to the South Ice Cap.

And I covered 834,934m by land.

In one flight using 2 jet engines 6 intakes 3 parachutes.

And 125 liters of fuel.

the smell of necro permeates the air.....

anyways there are much newer and more up to date threads, these are from pre 0.18 so we don't even have the same parts anymore.

while we're at it, let's have a post countdown til a moderator locks the thread.

~5

Yeah, parts, physics, planets, terrain, space center, landing gears, Kerbals, RCS, what exactly is the same since then?

~4
hay i am very close to beating the air speed record but i dont know if it has been beaten i got to 875m/s
i did the airspeed record at 1216m/s

I think I old the land speed record at 464m/s with stock parts!

- No hacks or cheats used.

Video:
I got an airspeed record of around 8000ms aerobraking after returning from Jool.

I want to go for the Jetspeed record, ie highest velocity with only jet engines with no altitude cap and no intake spamming, so far I have topped 2400m/s reached at 26km, I think I can improve on that though

I reached 2,112m/s speed at 16km's.

It took me 17mins 23secs to fly to the South Ice Cap.

And I covered 834,934m by land.

In one flight using 2 jet engines 6 intakes 3 parachutes.

And 125 liters of fuel.

New record! Biggest necro!
